info.description: This is the documentation for the Weatherbit Weather API.  The base URL for the API is [http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/) or [https://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/). Below is the Swagger UI documentation for the API. All API requests require the `key` parameter.        An Example for a 5 day forecast for London, UK would be `http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/forecast/3hourly?city=London`&`country=UK`. See our [Weather API description page](https://www.weatherbit.io/api) for additional documentation.
info.title: Weatherbit.io - Swagger UI Weather API documentation

get.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR
parameters.name: city

parameters.description: Full name of state.
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter).
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: Start Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: End Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
parameters.name: units

parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
parameters.name: callback

parameters.description: Your registered API key.
parameters.name: key

get.description: Returns a 3-hourly forecast, where each point represents a three hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR
parameters.name: city

parameters.description: Full name of state.
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter).
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: Number of days to return. Default 5.
parameters.name: days

parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
parameters.name: units

parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example - callback=func
parameters.name: callback

parameters.description: Your registered API key.
parameters.name: key

get.description: **(REQUIRED: Basic Plan or Higher)** Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC. Accepts a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR
parameters.name: city

parameters.description: Full name of state.
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter).
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: Number of days to return. Default 16.
parameters.name: days

parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
parameters.name: units

parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example - callback=func
parameters.name: callback

parameters.description: Your registered API key.
parameters.name: key

get.description: Returns aggregate energy specific historical weather fields, over a specified time period. Supply a bounding box ex: lat1=40&lon1=-78&lat2=38&lon2=-80. This API will return UP TO 150 stations, aggregated by the specified time period start_date to end_date.

parameters.name: lat1

parameters.description: Longitude of upper left corner.
parameters.name: lon1

parameters.description: Latitude of lower right corner.
parameters.name: lat2

parameters.description: Longitude of lower right corner.
parameters.name: lon2

parameters.description: Start Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: End Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: Temperature threshold to use to calculate degree days (default 18 C)
parameters.name: threshold

parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description
parameters.name: units

parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func
parameters.name: callback

parameters.description: Your registered API key.
parameters.name: key

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

slp.description: Mean sea level pressure in millibars (mb)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

sun_hours.description: Average number of daily sun hours - # hours where Solar GHI > 1000 W/m^2

max_dhi.description: [Deprecated] Max direct component of solar insolation (W/m^2)

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

pop.description: Chance of Precipitation as a percentage (%)

precip.description: Accumulated precipitation since last forecast point - default (mm)

snow.description: Accumulated snowfall since last forecast point - default (mm)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

pod.description: Part of day (d = day, n = night)

pop.description: Chance of Precipitation as a percentage (%)

precip.description: Accumulated precipitation since last forecast point. Default (mm)

precip6h.description: Accumulated precipitation since last forecast point. Default (mm)

snow.description: Accumulated snowfall since last forecast point - Default (mm)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

organization.example: AS11426 Time Warner Cable Internet LLC

datetime.description: Date in format "YYYY-MM-DD". All datetime is in (UTC)

dhi.description: Average hourly diffuse horizontal solar irradiance (W/m^2)

ghi.description: Average hourly global horizontal solar irradiance (W/m^2)

max_temp_ts.description: Time of max memperature - Unix Timestamp

max_wind_dir.description: Direction of wind at time of max 2min wind (degrees)

max_wind_spd_ts.description: Time of max 2min wind - unix timestamp

min_temp_ts.description: Time of max temperature - unix timestamp

rh.description: Average relative humidity as a percentage (%)

datetime.description: Date in format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". All datetime is in (UTC)

pod.description: Part of the day (d = day, n = night)

precip6h.description: Liquid equivalent precipitation in last 6 hours - Default (mm)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display
